an4.65:4.1: “Mendicants, these four people are found in the world.
an4.65:4.3: There are those whose estimation of and confidence in others is based on appearance, on eloquence, on mortification, and on principle.
an4.65:4.4: These are the four people found in the world.”
an4.65:5.2: and those who follow a voice,
an4.65:5.3: are under the sway of desire and greed.
an4.65:6.3: the fool shut in on every side,
an4.65:6.4: gets carried away by a voice.
an4.65:7.4: they’re also carried away by a voice.
an4.65:8.4: they don’t get carried away by a voice.”
